channel.title: Blog on Maintainerati
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Maintainerati

item.title: Reviving Maintainerati
item.description: “We’re putting the band back together” February 2017 saw a group of open source maintainers gathered at GitHub’s HQ in San Francisco, an event then repeated in London and Amsterdam. One left these events feeling both inspired and empowered. During those events, one important thing we learned is that maintainers need to have access to others who are sharing the same experiences, struggles & successes they have while running an open source project.

item.title: Is This Thing On?
item.description: Howdy! This is just a mic check. Soon, the lights will dim and the show will start, but until then, we encourage you to check back in soon…
